ATTACHMENT 1
PROFORMA FOR BANK GUARANTEE FOR EARNEST MONEY DEPOSIT
(On Non-Judicial Stamp Paper of Appropriate Value)

Ref:
Date:
Bank Guarantee No.:

To,
NTPC Limited

Dear Sir,
(Mis.) for [name of project], the Bidder, [name of bidder], having its registered office at [address], hereby submits

of Rs. [amount], valid up to [date].

This Bank Guarantee is being
[name of bank], a bank established under the laws of [country],
[address of bank], or one of our branches at [address of branch],

In witness whereof, the bank, through its authorized officer, has set its hand and stamp on [date] at [place].

Yours faithfully,

Witness:
(Signature)
(Name)
(Designation with Bank Seal)

Bank Seal
Power of Attorney No.: [number]
Date: [date]

Note:

Write the name and addresses of all the Joint Venture partners in case the Bid is submitted by a Joint Venture in terms of the Qualifying Requirements.
The Bank Guarantee shall be from a bank as per the provisions of the Bidding Documents.
The Stamp Paper of appropriate value should be purchased in the name of the guaranteeing bank or Bidder.
While getting the Bank Guarantee issued, Bidders are required to ensure compliance with the points mentioned in the Bank Guarantee Verification Checklist in the Bidding Documents. Bidders should fill out this checklist and enclose it along with the Bank Guarantee.
